c6ace75a-ee7d-494a-a0f6-b3e928b31118.notes: A roll at IQ-4, +1/level of Cunning Folk, to notice anything odd – curses, blights, faeries in the basement, etc. – that happens to animals, crops, or people in an area where you’ve lived for at least (6 - Cunning Folk level) months.
